Jesus Answers the Pharisees, Sadducees, and Scribes

Sadducees (who say that there is no resurrection) *came to Jesus, and  questioning Him, saying,
“Teacher, Moses wrote for us that if a man’s brother dies and leaves behind a wife and does not leave a child, his brother is to marry the wife and raise up children for his brother.
There were seven brothers; and the first took a wife, and died leaving no children.
The second one married her, and died leaving behind no children; and the third likewise;
and  the seven  left no children. Last of all the woman also died.
In the resurrection, which one’s wife will she be? For  the seven had her as  wife.”
